text: Læa meux phwk cea phb brrda phu ptiseth sraththa k cng fan thi khx (cng kha seiy) cnkrathang meux phwk cea prab phwk khea cn phæ læw k cng cab phwk khea pen chely hlangcak nan ca plxy pen thi hrux ca reiyk xea kha thi kdi cnkrathang kar tha sngkhram di sinsud lng dwy kar wang xawuth chen nan hæla læa ha kxallxh thrng prasngkh nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng txbthæn kar lngthosʹ phwk khea tæ thangni pheux phraxngkh ca thrng thdsxb bang khnnı hmu phwk cea kab xik bang khn swn brrda phu thi thuk kha tay nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ phraxngkh ca mi thrng thahı kar ngan khxng phwk khea ri phl penxankhad
